coupons.title: Two 1-Topping Pizzas $4.99 Each
coupons.description: Two create-your-own round pizzas with 1 topping each for just $4.99 per pizza! Use code PIZZAPIZZA (or PIZZAPIZZA1 in select locations).
coupons.terms: Valid at participating Little Caesars locations. Prices may vary in some locations. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Two Large Specialty Pizzas for $30
coupons.description: Get two large specialty pizzas for just $30! Perfect for families or parties.
coupons.terms: ‚ö†Ô∏è EXPIRES SOON - Jan 11! Valid at participating locations only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Free Crazy Bread with $4.99 Purchase
coupons.description: Get FREE Crazy Bread when you spend $4.99 or more! Limited time offer.
coupons.terms: Valid at participating locations. Minimum purchase of $4.99 required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: $5 Off Any $30+ Purchase
coupons.description: Save $5 on orders totaling $30 or more. Great for family meals!
coupons.terms: Valid at participating locations. Minimum purchase of $30 required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: 10% Off Orders of $10 or More
coupons.description: Enjoy 10% off when you spend $10 or more on your Little Caesars order.
coupons.terms: Valid at participating locations. Minimum purchase of $10 required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Buy One Get One Crazy Puffs
coupons.description: Buy any two pizzas and get BOGO on Crazy Puffs! Sweet or savory - your choice.
coupons.terms: Valid with purchase of any two pizzas. Valid at participating locations. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: 20% Off Any Pizza with Purchase
coupons.description: Get 20% off any pizza when you purchase another pizza at regular price.
coupons.terms: Valid at participating locations. Must purchase at least one pizza at regular price. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: 20% Off $20+ Delivery Orders
coupons.description: Save 20% on delivery orders totaling $20 or more. Order from home!
coupons.terms: Valid for delivery orders only. Minimum purchase of $20 required. Delivery fees may apply. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Free Italian Cheese Bread with $40 Spend
coupons.description: Spend $40 or more and get a FREE Italian Cheese Bread! Perfect for large orders.
coupons.terms: Valid at participating locations. Minimum purchase of $40 required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Hot-N-Ready $7.99 Special
coupons.description: Classic Hot-N-Ready Pepperoni or Cheese Pizza for just $7.99! No coupon needed - available as always.
coupons.terms: Available at all participating Little Caesars locations. No coupon code needed. While supplies last.

coupons.title: Caesar Rewards App Exclusive
coupons.description: Download the Little Caesars app and get exclusive app-only deals and earn points with every order!
coupons.terms: Must download Little Caesars app and create account. Offers vary by location and time. Check app for current deals.

coupons.title: üèà Super Bowl LX Party Pack Special
coupons.description: Order the Super Bowl Party Pack and save big! Perfect for game day - February 9, 2026!
coupons.terms: Valid for Super Bowl Sunday only. Pre-order recommended 24-48 hours in advance. Valid at participating locations.
